{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the relevant documents, there is evidence to suggest that there is a correlation between end-tidal carbon dioxide (EtCO2) and arterial carbon dioxide (PaCO2) in extremely low birth weight (ELBW) infants in the first week of life.
